message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you're placing on the product, $120 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $120 might be a bit steep for you. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $110 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm sticking with my previous offer of $90. It's the most I can afford at this time.
I understand that you're sticking to your original offer, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $105.

Alice, I appreciate your continued flexibility. While $105 is closer to my budget, I'm still hoping we can meet in the middle.  Would you consider my previous offer of $90?  I'm truly interested in this product, and I believe this price reflects a fair deal for both of us.
I understand that you're still interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $102.

Alice, I truly appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $102 is tempting, I'm still hoping we can find a price that works for both of us. I'm sticking to my previous offer of $90.  It's the best I can do at this time.

I understand that you're sticking to your offer, Bob. However, I'm getting close to accepting the offer to sell the product to John for $100. I'm willing to make one last compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $98.
